item.title: Effortless MacOS Desktop Navigation: Boost Your Productivity and Master Your Workflow
item.description: IntroductionAny one who has used a mac knows that the whole MacOS experience revolves around the concept of desktops. Desktops are a way to organize your workflow, and keep your work organized. The problem is that most people don’t use desktops to their full potential. Most of us rely on multiple 3-finger swipes on the trackpad to navigate to the desktop we want. In this blog post, I will show you some shortcuts that you can enable to make this process effortless.
